zone: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh City District
circumstances: Shortly after takeoff, an unexpected failure on both engines forced the crew to make an emergency landing in a paddy field. The aircraft belly landed, slid for several yards before coming to rest in flames. All 23 occupants escaped unhurt while the aircraft was destroyed by fire.
probable_cause: Both propeller went into overspeed after rotation for unknown reason, necessitating an emergency landing.
